name: A Rolling Stone That Gathers Moss
name_original: A Rolling Stone That Gathers Moss
description:
Clear each level of moss while also using it as your movement resource.

...

A tech demo in Dungeonscript, a mod by Farbs for Puzzlescript allowing for 3D perspective. Arrow keys are enabled but Left/Right Arrow will not function as intended for this game; please use WASD.
